import React from 'react' import '../../../../App.css' import '../../../../Styles/Dashboard.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faArrowDown, faArrowUp } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function DashboardTotalCount(props) { console.log(props.item) return (

{props.title}

{props.count}

{ props.isDecrease &&

{props.percent}%

since last month

} { !props.isDecrease &&

{props.percent}%

since last month

}
) }
